name: Garbage Fish (Pybasti)
description:
I made the game in the SEAJAM Game Jam.  
It's my first game and also my first game jam.
It's a game about a fish who collects rubbish and 
wants to save the sea.
 But don't touch anchors! 
Have fun
If you have any questions or problems, just contact me
 or write a comment.
----------------------------------------------
Please use window mode if you can. 
It may be a bug in fullscreen mode.
----------------------------------------------
and please give me FEEDBACK!!
##############################################
IMPORTANT:
the game is unfortunately recognized as a "virus"
But it is NOT. You have to deactivate the virus protection
or download the original Python file.
There is also the code if you want to check
that it is not a virus.
##############################################
